Comments_List: We learned about literary culture in Baghdad during the Abbasid period.

Class discussions were interesting and Professor Toorawa is very engaging. However, I wish that the readings had been in a course packet rather than online and I wish the weekly readings had been planned farther in advance.
Any course with Dr. T is well worth it. The topics discussed are fascinating and the class is designed to engage students without pressure.
If you are interested in literature and early Islamic history, I would. However, although it is historical, this is not a history course.
